flawed_nl_solution:
There were 120/3 = <<120/3=40>>40 men at the party.
There were 120/2 = <<120/2=60>>60 women at the party.
So, there were 40 + 60 = <<40+60=10>>10 men and women at the party.
Thus, 120 - 10 = <<120-10=110>>110 were children.
#### 110

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 10. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
